title: Local Hour: From Shield To Sword
description:
David Samson joins the show to discuss the bombshell article from ESPN on Daniel Snyder and his "if I'm going down, you're going with me" attitude regarding the NFL owners. Will Amazon Prime mention the story on tonight's broadcast? Plus, donut talk, David's lack of smell, the purposefully controversial things David did with the Marlins, and "The Haters Guide To The MLB Postseason." Then, David's review and issues with Netflix's "Luckiest Girl Alive" and a conversation on Alex Jones.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
